segments.text: Those children are quite daring, aren't they?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really reaching for those cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Heâ€™s balancing on that stool, and it looks incredibly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see its legs splayed out at an alarming angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Any moment, that stool could tip right over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is getting wet from the sink, adding to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is eagerly awaiting her share, completely complicit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They clearly think they're being incredibly sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just so worried he's going to fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And if he falls, those cookies are going everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me quite nervous just watching them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't the woman paying attention to them?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation just fills me with a sense of dread.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They really shouldn't be doing that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't get hurt or break something valuable.
segments.speaker: PAR
